original_title: Sri Lanka win toss in second Pakistan Test, to bat first
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka captain Dimuth Karunaratne won the toss and opted to bat first in the second Test against Pakistan at the SSC Grounds.
As expected, Sri Lanka made two changes, with Dilshan Madushanka getting a Test debut in place of Vishwa Fernando, and Asitha Fernando coming in for Kasun Rajitha.
